thread.title: Live: Modi Parivartan rally: The huge turnout in today's rally will lay all speculation to rest about the outcome of UP elections: PM Modi in Lucknow
thread.title_full: Live: Modi Parivartan rally: The huge turnout in today's rally will lay all speculation to rest about the outcome of UP elections: PM Modi in Lucknow

author: Pm Modi To The Cheers Of The Public
title: Live: Modi Parivartan rally: The huge turnout in today's rally will lay all speculation to rest about the outcome of UP elections: PM Modi in Lucknow
text:
02:46 PM (IST) Development was in exile for 14 years: PM Modi 
BJP never calculates how many years it is in power or out of power, PM Modi said. "Many people are saying BJP was in exile for 14 years in UP. The real issue is not that. The issue is development was in exile," Modi added. 02:44 PM (IST) The huge turnout in today's rally will lay all speculation to rest about the outcome of UP elections: PM Modi in Lucknow 02:41 PM (IST) Leaders like Vajpayee had cemented BJP's base in Lucknow by his hard work: PM Modi 02:39 PM (IST) Modi in Lucknow 02:38 PM (IST) Even when I was contesting for the Lok Sabha elections, I never came across such a big gathering PM Modi to the cheers of the public 02:38 PM (IST) I am associated with Indian politics for a long time. But I have never seen such a huge rally: PM Modi 02:36 PM (IST) PM starts addressing mega rally in Lucknow 02:26 PM (IST) Rajnath speaking at Lucknow rally 01:56 PM (IST) Aajkal har roz UP mein alag alag tarah ke naatak logon ke saamne aa rahe hain, ye dhyaan batane ke liye hai sirf: Amit Shah in Lucknow pic.twitter.com/lASmjJRFTL & amp; mdash; ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) January 2, 2017 01:51 PM (IST) Amit Shah speaking at Parivartan rally 12:35 PM (IST) 
BJP has invited around 1.28 lakh booth level workers, whom it plans to mobilise to turn public opinion in its favour for the forthcoming state assembly polls. 11:09 AM (IST) People gather for Parivartan rally venue in Lucknow 
Photo: ANI 10:28 AM (IST) 
It will be the first rally by Prime Minister Modi after the expiry of 50-day grace period of demonetisation on December 30. 10:28 AM (IST) 
The rally is seen as a culmination of the four Parivartan yatras carried out by the BJP in the state recently. 10:28 AM (IST) 
Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) president Amit Shah, senior leaders Rajnath Singh, Kalraj Mishra and Uma Bharti are among those attending the rally. 10:27 AM (IST) 
Union ministers and MPs representing Uttar Pradesh at the Centre have already reached Lucknow to take part in the rally. From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
